careers_description: We're looking for talented professionals to work on exciting projects. Join our team of experts!

vacancies.response_format: Follow the link and fill out the form.

skills.main: Strong experience with React 18+ and Next.js
skills.state: State management with Redux Toolkit, React Query
skills.testing: Testing with Jest, React Testing Library
skills.tools: Experience with build tools (Webpack, Vite) and modern workflows
skills.plus: Experience with micro-frontends and module federation is a plus

skills.wordpress: WordPress dev, experience with Gravity forms, eLearning, custom plugins

skills.specialization: ROS Python developer specializing in robotics and image recognition
skills.focus: Working with cameras, tracking, image segmentation, ROS2

skills.main: Experience migrating applications from .NET Framework 4.8 to .NET 5 or newer
skills.experience: Confidence and proven experience in performing such migrations

skills.optional: Optional: Pandas, NumPy, Jupyter (for data/ML), AWS/GCP/Azure

skills.frontend: Frontend: React, Next.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, CSS, SASS/Tailwind CSS
skills.additional: Additional: Redux, JWT, WebSocket, AWS/Vercel, integrations, webhooks, etc.

skills.experience: 1-2 years of experience in sales (experience in the IT industry will be an advantage)
skills.languages: Fluent in English, additional languages are a plus
skills.tech: Basic understanding of IT services and solutions
skills.relationships: Ability to build and maintain client relationships
skills.compensation: Compensation: Base salary + 10% commission from successful sales

skills.experience: 3+ years of experience in sales in the IT/tech industry
skills.strategies: Ability to develop and implement sales strategies
skills.crm: Experience with CRM systems and sales analytics
skills.targets: Proven ability to meet and exceed sales targets
skills.compensation: Compensation: Base salary + 15% commission from successful sales

skills.experience: 5+ years of experience in client relationship management in IT/tech industry
skills.relationships: Strong relationship building and management skills
skills.negotiations: Advanced negotiation and contract management skills
skills.technical: Solid technical understanding of IT services and solutions
skills.compensation: Compensation: Base salary + 20% commission from successful sales

no_vacancies: No vacancies available in this category
not_found_suitable: Haven't found a suitable position? Send us your resume, and we'll contact you when a matching position becomes available.
